messages.message: :hammer_and_wrench: Hey team, just merged in a PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71716) that runs Jest unit tests in webpacked as a GitHub Action. It seems a bit faster than Jenkins from my rough comparison on a single PR . Lmk if you find that the result is incorrect, or if the GH action is slower than Jenkins. If everything goes well, I plan to make it merge blocking and stop running Jenkins on frontend PRs
